relationships.evidence_text: David Bronner is CEO or Cosmic Engagement Officer of Dr. Bronner's, the top selling brand of natural soaps in North America.

and a fifth generation soap maker.

David was born in Los Angeles, California in 1973.
and earned an undergraduate degree in biology from Harvard University.
